/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street, divided by a concrete median, stretches out into the distance, flanked by buildings and trees on both sides. A few cars can be seen navigating the road, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise static urban landscape. The sky above is a clear blue, devoid of any clouds, suggesting a bright and sunny day.
